name: ANA - All Nippon - Business Class and Economy on the 787
description:
It's time to check out ANA - All Nippon Airlines on their Boeing 787 service from Sydney to Tokyo Haneda.  This is a business class review however I did wander back to economy and managed film the ANA Economy Class too. 

Here's the link to Paul Stewart's ANA review - definitely worth checking out!  https://youtu.be/rlJHXzP23Is

This ANA business class review starts in the Air New Zealand business class lounge at Sydney airport.  Then it's time to board the Boeing 787 Dreamliner for our overnight flight to Japan. Once in the air service starts with a drink from the bar followed by dinner.  This ANA business class flight review covers every aspect of the All Nippon inflight service including the amenities and inflight entertainment system.  

Route:     Sydney, Australia (SYD) to Tokyo Haneda, Japan (HND)
Length:   4,863 miles,  8:55 hrs
Flight:     NH880
When:    Oct 2018
Aircraft:  Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner  registration JA886A (2016)
Seat:       8K
Camera:  Sony FDR-AXP53


This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.
